# nw_parameters_attribution_t.user

**Case**

The user explicitly directs the app to make a network request.

## Declaration

```swift
case user
```

## Discussion

Use this value for the `attribution` parameter of a call to the [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/nw_parameters_get_attribution(_:)] method when constructing a network request that satisfies a user request to access an explicit, unmodified URL. In all other cases, use the [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/nw_parameters_attribution_t/developer] value instead.

## Request Sources

- **nw_parameters_attribution_t.developer**: A developer-initiated network request.
